answers.answer: Hi and thanks for using the forum.Congratulations on your pregnancy.  You really need to discuss this with your ob/gyn.  He or she can explain why they want to induce you at 37 weeks.  Talk with your doctor at your next appointment and find out what he/she is thinking.  Sometimes, doctors think you understand something and don't realize that you need it to be explained. I am sure that he or she will be happy to explain it to you.  Good luck!Bridget

question: Hello, I'm 35w and in week 25 I found out I had sugar diabetes. At first I went on a diet but wasn't enough. For the last month I get insuline shots every day. Now my doctor decided to induce at 37w and gave me a cortizone shot. Sugar level went sky high. Baby is fine. Why do I have to get an induction that early?
title: 35w with sugar diabetes
